  • menu module

menu module¶

This module acts as a controller for the system.

Contains:

  • main()

  • update_status()

menu.MAINL_IN = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Frame object>]]¶

GUI elements for section file management.

menu.MAINL_OUT = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Frame object>]]¶

GUI elements for starting generation of a pdf.

menu.MAINL_STATUS = [[<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Text object>], [<PySimpleGUI.PySimpleGUI.Pane object>]]¶

GUI elements for showing the status of files.

menu.edit_profile_menu()¶

Pops open a window for editing personal information.

menu.edit_section_menu()¶

Pops open a window for editing an existing section.

menu.main()¶
menu.new_pdf_menu()¶

Pops open a window for creating a new cover letter.

menu.new_section_menu()¶

Pops open a window for creating a new section.

menu.quick_pdf()¶

Randomly creates a cover letter from the available sections, while following formatting rules. Pops open a window alerting the user that this was done.

menu.update_status()¶

Sets the output element in the GUI to reflect latest values.
